sentences.sContent: Don't push for an interview on the spot, but rather explain that you want to let them know of your interest, drop off your resume, and complete an application while you're there if possible.
sentences.sContent_eng: Don't push for an interview on the spot, but rather explain that you want to let them know of your interest, drop off your resume, and complete an application while you're there if possible.
sentences.sCn: 这个时候不要急着想得到面试，而是解释为你只是想让他们知道你对他们招聘的职位有兴趣，放下你的简历，然后有可能的话填完一份申请表就离开吧。

sentences.sContent: ...Each student was given the same resume but the applicant’s picture was altered so that in some photos...
...researchers at California State University asked 136 college students to review the resume and photograph of a female applicant for a job as an accountant...

remMethod.val: re ＋ sume(拿起) → 重新拿起 → 重新开始

words.tran: 恢复；重新开始；取回；重获；恢复硬币支付

trans.tranOther: a short written account of your education and your previous jobs that you send to an employer when you are looking for a new job
